name.str: pair of 2-by-arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of 2-by-arm guards

description: A pair of improvised arm guards made from broken pieces of a plank that are tied to your arms with rags and string.  They offer good protection, but are really uncomfortable to wear.

name.str: pair of chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards made from the exoskeletons of insects.  Light and durable.

name.str: pair of XL chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards made from the exoskeletons of insects.  Light and durable.  Larger than average.

name.str: pair of XS chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards made from the exoskeletons of insects.  Light and durable.  Smaller than average.

name.str: pair of biosilicified chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of biosilicified chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant but brittle.

name.str: pair of XL biosilicified chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL biosilicified chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant but brittle and sized for the largest of survivors.

name.str: pair of XS biosilicified chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS biosilicified chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant but brittle and sized for the smallest of survivors.

name.str: pair of cloth-padded sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of cloth-padded sleeves

description: The sleeves of a thick cotton shirt, with a bunch of cloth sewn in to act as extra padding.  They're quite lonely, no longer being attached to each other by the rest of the shirt.

name.str: pair of hard arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of hard arm guards

description: A pair of neoprene arm sleeves covered with molded plastic sheaths.

name.str: pair of XL hard arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL hard arm guards

description: A pair of neoprene arm sleeves covered with molded plastic sheaths.  Epic sized.

name.str: pair of XS hard arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS hard arm guards

description: A pair of neoprene arm sleeves covered with molded plastic sheaths.  Tiny sized.

name.str: pair of leather arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of leather arm guards

description: A pair of tough leather arm guards.  Light and comfortable.

name.str: pair of XL leather arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL leather arm guards

description: A pair of gigantic leather arm guards.  Heavy but comfortable.

name.str: pair of XS leather arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS leather arm guards

description: A pair of tiny, tough leather arm guards.  Light and comfortable.

name.str: pair of steel arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of steel arm guards

description: A full assembly of medieval arm protection.  Rerebraces, couters, and vambraces, with leather straps to secure each piece and connect it as part of a set.

name.str: pair of XL steel arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL steel arm guards

description: A full assembly of medieval arm protection, made for Jotun.  Rerebraces, couters, and vambraces, with leather straps to secure each piece and connect it as part of a set.

name.str: pair of XS steel arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS steel arm guards

description: A full assembly of medieval arm protection.  Rerebraces, couters, and vambraces, with leather straps to secure each piece and connect it as part of a set.

name.str: pair of sheet metal arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of sheet metal arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards hammered out from metal, avoiding joints.  Perfect for the Post-Apocalyptic Warrior look.
//: The weight assumes four sheets of about 25cm x 20cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of case hardened sheet metal arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of case hardened sheet metal arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards hammered out from sheet metal, case hardened for extra protection.  Still manages that Post-Apocalyptic Warrior look.

name.str: pair of sheet metal bracers
name.str_pl: pairs of sheet metal bracers

description: A pair of arm guards hammered out from metal, only covering your forearms.
//: The weight assumes two sheets of about 25cm x 20cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of hardened sheet metal bracers
name.str_pl: pairs of hardened sheet metal bracers

description: A pair of forearm guards hammered out from sheet metal, case hardened for extra protection.

name.str: pair of sheet metal pauldrons
name.str_pl: pairs of sheet metal pauldrons

description: Two half-cylinders of sheet metal jutting out over your shoulders and two more underneath.  They make it impossible to raise your arms fully, but they'll keep your arms attached to you.
//: The weight assumes four sheets of about 15cm x 15cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of case hardened sheet metal pauldrons
name.str_pl: pairs of case hardened sheet metal pauldrons

description: A pair of crude pauldrons made out of sheet metal and case hardened for reinforcement.

name.str: pair of sheet metal elbow guards
name.str_pl: pairs of sheet metal elbow guards

description: Two small half-cylinders of sheet metal cut down and hammered to fit over your elbows.  Very brutal, just needs spikes.
//: The weight assumes two sheets of about 15cm x 15cm x 1.5mm.

name.str: pair of case hardened sheet metal elbow guards
name.str_pl: pairs of case hardened sheet metal elbow guards

description: Elbow guards of sheet metal, case hardened to make sure you never bang your funny bone on the table again.

name.str: pair of XL sheet metal arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL sheet metal arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards hammered out from metal.  Perfect for the Post-Apocalyptic Warrior look.  Larger than average.

name.str: pair of XS sheet metal arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS sheet metal arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards hammered out from metal.  Perfect for the Post-Apocalyptic Warrior look.  Smaller than average.

name.str: pair of paper arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of paper arm guards

description: Arm guards made of stacked paper sheets held together with duct tape.

name.str: pair of improvised tire arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of improvised tire arm guards

description: Arm guards made of thick chunks of tire held together with duct tape.

name.str: pair of scrap arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of scrap arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards made from scraps of metal secured by simple strings.

name.str: pair of XL scrap arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL scrap arm guards

description: A pair of oversized arm guards made from scraps of metal secured by simple strings; the loose collection of plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.

name.str: pair of XS scrap arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS scrap arm guards

description: A pair of undersized arm guards made from scraps of metal secured by simple strings; the loose collection of plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.

name.str: pair of tire arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of tire arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards made from thick chunks of tire secured by simple strings; the loose collection of rubber plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.

name.str: pair of XL tire arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL tire arm guards

description: A pair of oversized arm guards made from thick chunks of tire secured by simple strings; the loose collection of rubber plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.

name.str: pair of XS tire arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS tire arm guards

description: A pair of undersized arm guards made from thick chunks of tire secured by simple strings; the loose collection of rubber plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.

name.str: pair of neoprene arm sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of neoprene arm sleeves

description: A pair of soft neoprene arm sleeves.  Often used in contact sports.

name.str: pair of XL neoprene arm sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of XL neoprene arm sleeves

description: A pair of extra large soft neoprene arm sleeves.  Often used in contact sports, by giants.

name.str: pair of XS neoprene arm sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of XS neoprene arm sleeves

description: A pair of extra small soft neoprene arm sleeves.  Often used in contact sports.

name.str: pair of gambeson sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of gambeson sleeves

description: A pair of arm sleeves made from heavy quilted fabric.

name.str: pair of XL gambeson sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of XL gambeson sleeves

description: A pair of extra large arm sleeves made from heavy quilted fabric.

name.str: pair of XS gambeson sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of XS gambeson sleeves

description: A pair of extra small arm sleeves made from heavy quilted fabric.

name.str: pair of Kevlar gambeson sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of Kevlar gambeson sleeves

description: A pair arm sleeves made from aramid, with strips of soft body armor sewn on top to simulate quilting.

armor.//: skip second entry for arm encumbrance

name.str: pair of XL Kevlar gambeson sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of XL Kevlar gambeson sleeves

description: A pair of extra large arm sleeves made from layers of Kevlar.

name.str: pair of XS Kevlar gambeson sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of XS Kevlar gambeson sleeves

description: A pair of extra small arm sleeves made from heavy quilted fabric and Kevlar.

name.str: pair of chainmail sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of chainmail sleeves

description: Customized chainmail arm protection.  The metal shows signs of rust and corrosion.  Both sleeves have straps to connect them with each other.  They don't cover the hands, making them less cumbersome and allowing them to be worn with gloves.

name.str: pair of mild steel chainmail sleeves
name.str_pl: pairs of mild steel chainmail sleeves

description: Customized mild steel chainmail arm protection.  Both sleeves have straps to connect them with each other.  They don't cover the hands, making them less cumbersome and allowing them to be worn with gloves.

name.str_pl: pairs of XL mild steel chainmail sleeves

description: Customized mild steel chainmail arm protection.  Both sleeves have straps to connect them with each other.  They don't cover the hands, making them less cumbersome and allowing them to be worn with gloves.  These are oversized.
